🎯 Getting into investment banking? Here's a starter guide to set you right on track.⁣
⁣
✔️ Step 1: Understand Your Field
The world of investment banking is vast. You need to understand what it involves- the trading, underwriting, M&A, etc. Get familiar with the industry’s lingo. Look up terms like interest rates, capital markets, financial models, etc.  

✔️ Step 2: Appropriate Education
If you haven't already, consider getting a degree in finance, accounting or economics for a foundational understanding. The more you know, the easier it becomes to build strategies and make financial decisions.

✔️ Step 3: Networking
Build your network. The finance industry thrives on connections. Attend events, reach out to professionals in the field via LinkedIn. Don’t hesitate to ask for advice.

✔️ Step 4: Relevant Experience
Secure internships or entry-level positions in financial institutions. This gives you an insightful exposure to your work environment before you fully step in.

✔️ Step 5: Constant Learning
Stay updated with the financial markets. Read books & financial news. The market always changes and if you want to stay relevant, you must be willing to change with it.

Remember, it’s all about patience and persistence. Keep at it and you'll conquer. Ready to take the leap?⁣
